content: Hello, I would like to confirm my understanding that GET "/[type]/_search?" is equivalent to GET "/[type]?". After looking at http://hl7.org/implement/standards/fhir/http.html, our developers got an impression that "/[type]?" is used with GET while "/[type]/_search?" is used with POST. However, both work well with GET on the reference servers. Once confirmed, I'm going to open a change request to clarify this at http://hl7.org/implement/standards/fhir/http.html (2.1.0.14 search & 2.1.0.22 Summary) and http://hl7.org/implement/standards/fhir/search.html (2.1.1.2 Introduction).
We're deprecating _search for get, but the servers still support it for legacy reasons
Maybe we should start removing that support to make this clearer?
And return a BadRequest with OperationOutcome that tells you what to do...
